level.text: Collection vehicles shall be properly maintained and cleaned.
Collection vehicles shall be constructed and operated to prevent spillage.
Each collection vehicle shall be equipped with a dumping mechanism.

Each collection vehicle shall be registered with the Mayor in accordance with DC Code § 50-1501.02. Any owner of a collection vehicle who can provide proof that the vehicle is registered in another state and that an excise tax for the issuance of a certificate of title has already been paid in another state, is exempt until September 30, 1980, from the provisions of DC Code § 50-2201.03(j).
